paper_abstract: In this article, we study negacyclic self-dual codes of length n over a finite chain ring R when the characteristic p of the residue field (R) over bar and the length n are relatively prime. We give necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of (nontrivial) negacyclic self-dual codes over a finite chain ring. As an application, we construct negacyclic MDR self-dual codes over GR(p (t) , m) of length p (m) + 1.
paper_title: Negacyclic self-dual codes over finite chain rings
